input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item specification information.

Item specification:
Graduation Scene Backdrop - Size 6 Ft. X 6 Ft.

Item keywords:
Perfect for graduation party
Use it for your picture wall
Ready to Hang
Size - 6 ft x 6ft.
input_text.Response A:
Thank you for your interest in our graduation scene backdrop! We are happy to help you find the perfect backdrop for your graduation party.

Our backdrop is 6 ft x 6 ft and is ready to hang. It is perfect for graduation parties and can also be used for picture walls. It is made of high-quality material that is durable and easy to clean.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us.
input_text.Response B: The Graduation Scene Backdrop is an exquisite piece that will add the perfect touch to any graduation party. This ready to hang backdrop is a full 6 feet by 6 feet, giving you plenty of space to take beautiful pictures. The backdrop is made of high-quality fabric that is durable and light-weight, making it easy to transport and set up. The beautiful graduation scene features a stunning background with a graduation cap, diploma, books, tassel, and more. The backdrop is perfect for taking pictures of your graduate, as well as creating a beautiful photo wall for all of your guests to enjoy. It's ready to hang, so there's no need for any assembly. Just unroll, hang it up, and start taking pictures!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
